p: Chronic active EBV infection is rare. It is characterized by a high EBV DNA load (10 3–10 7 copies/mL), indicative of active lytic viral replication [ 10]. It is unrelated to the fatigue experienced in IM that may last months to a year. Immunomodulatory agents (such as interferon-α and interleukin-2) have been used for treatment of chronic active EBV but with limited success.
